entry.title: Wednesday night: Overcast. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then light before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain mixed with light snow beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with light snow changing to snow late in the evening. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
